hero.title: Fetch Blockchain Data
hero.subtitle: An essential tool for developers, analysts, and investors, providing a unified solution for accessing complex blockchain data. We handle the complexity so you can focus on building.

trusted.title: Supporting the biggest chains in Web3

features.title: Why Choose CryptoSeed?
features.subtitle: A secure, simple, and powerful way to interact with blockchain data.

items.title: Unified API
items.description: One API for all your blockchain data needs. Access wallets, tokens, NFTs, and transactions across multiple chains.

items.title: Client-Side Security
items.description: Your seed phrase is your key. It's processed only in your browser and is never sent to our servers. Ever.

items.title: Developer Focused
items.description: Built for developers, by developers. Robust documentation, easy integration, and powerful SDKs.
